org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq

Interface FastqRecordBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<FastqRecord>

    public interface FastqRecordBuilder
extends Builder<FastqRecord>
    FastqRecordBuilder is a Builder implementation that can create new instances of FastqRecords.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NucleotideSequence basecalls()
      Get the current basecalls value.
      FastqRecordBuilder basecalls(NucleotideSequence basecalls)
      Set the new value of the basecalls for this record.
      FastqRecord build()
      Create a new FastqRecord instance using the given parameters.
      Optional<String> comment()
      Get the current value for the comments.
      FastqRecordBuilder comment(String comments)
      Add the given String to this fastq record as a comment which will get returned by FastqRecord.getComment().
      static FastqRecordBuilder create(String id, NucleotideSequence bases, QualitySequence qualities)
      Create a new instance of FastqRecordBuilder with the given required parameters.
      static FastqRecordBuilder create(String id, NucleotideSequence bases, QualitySequence qualities, String optionalComment)
      Create a new instance of FastqRecordBuilder with the given parameters.

      Get the current id value.
      FastqRecordBuilder id(String id)
      Set the new value of the id for this record.

      Get the current qualities value.

      Set the new value of the qualities for this record.
      FastqRecordBuilder trim(Range trimRange)
      Trim both the nucleotide and quality sequences to only include the given Range.

    • Method Detail

      • comment

        FastqRecordBuilder comment(String comments)
        Add the given String to this fastq record as a comment which will get returned by FastqRecord.getComment(). Calling this method more than once will cause the last value to overwrite the previous value.
        Parameters:
        comments - the comment to make for this record; if this is set to null (the default) then this record has no comment.
        Returns:
        this.

      • build

        FastqRecord build()
        Create a new FastqRecord instance using the given parameters.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<FastqRecord>
        Returns:
        a new FastqRecord; will never be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the length of the NucleotideSequence and QualitySequence don't match. (Since 5.3)

      • comment

        Optional<String> comment()
        Get the current value for the comments.
        Returns:
        an Optional which either contains a non-null String if there are current comments; or empty Optional if there are no comments.
        Since:
        5.3

      • id

        String id()
        Get the current id value.
        Returns:
        the id of this record as a String; will never be null but may contain spaces.
        Since:
        5.3

      • id

        FastqRecordBuilder id(String id)
        Set the new value of the id for this record.
        Parameters:
        id - the new id to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if id is null.
        Since:
        5.3

      • basecalls

        NucleotideSequence basecalls()
        Get the current basecalls value.
        Returns:
        the basecalls of this record as a String; will never be null.
        Since:
        5.3

      • basecalls

        FastqRecordBuilder basecalls(NucleotideSequence basecalls)
        Set the new value of the basecalls for this record.
        Parameters:
        basecalls - the new basecalls to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if basecalls is null.
        Since:
        5.3

      • qualities

        QualitySequence qualities()
        Get the current qualities value.
        Returns:
        the qualities of this record as a String; will never be null.
        Since:
        5.3

      • qualities

        FastqRecordBuilder qualities(QualitySequence qualities)
        Set the new value of the qualities for this record.
        Parameters:
        qualities - the new qualities to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if qualities is null.
        Since:
        5.3

      • trim

        FastqRecordBuilder trim(Range trimRange)
        Trim both the nucleotide and quality sequences to only include the given Range.
        Parameters:
        trimRange - the range to trim to; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if trimRange is null.
        Since:
        5.3

      • create

        static FastqRecordBuilder create(String id,
                                 NucleotideSequence bases,
                                 QualitySequence qualities)
        Create a new instance of FastqRecordBuilder with the given required parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of this fastq record; can not be null but may contain whitespace.
        basecalls - the NucleotideSequence for this fastq record; can not be null.
        qualities - the QualitySequence for this fastq record; can not be null.
        Returns:
        a new FastqRecordBuilder instance initialized with the given values.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any parameters are null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the length of the NucleotideSequence and QualitySequence don't match.

      • create

        static FastqRecordBuilder create(String id,
                                 NucleotideSequence bases,
                                 QualitySequence qualities,
                                 String optionalComment)
        Create a new instance of FastqRecordBuilder with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of this fastq record; can not be null but may contain whitespace.
        basecalls - the NucleotideSequence for this fastq record; can not be null.
        qualities - the QualitySequence for this fastq record; can not be null.
        optionalComment - the optional comment; may be null to mean no comment.
        Returns:
        a new FastqRecordBuilder instance initialized with the given values.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if id, bases or qualities are null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the length of the NucleotideSequence and QualitySequence don't match.
